gabriel.acl
Class Acl

java.lang.Object
  gabriel.acl.Acl
public class Acl
extends java.lang.Object

Access control list for managing permissions. ACLs contain entries which map principals to permissions.

Version:
$Id: Acl.html,v 1.1.1.1 2004-06-16 07:56:34 stephan Exp $
Author:
Stephan J. Schmidt
